title: Bug 13947"New Item Shortcuts" don't appear in drop down menu
description: Bug 13947"New Item Shortcuts" don't appear in drop down menu
OB: build 20020412select WindowCustomize Perspectivecheck the TestCase and TestSuite items under "New Item Shortcuts"Note that no menu items appear in the "New Item" toolbar item menuThis works for all other items except for the two that are in the JUnitsubcategory of the Java category.
